DESCRIPTION: Get a list of supported languages, or set the one for this server.
LANG_SET: The language for this server was set to {{flag}} **{{localized}}** ({{name}}).
ERR_NO_LANG_ERR: "`{{input}}`" isn't a language we support currently.
ERR_NO_LANG_INFO: To check a list of languages we support, run this command again with no arguments.
ERR_INVALID_CODE: "`{{input}}`" isn't a valid language identifier. A valid language identifier looks like this: `en_US`.
